title: Knotel Strikes Deal With Creditors to Extend Bankruptcy Sale Process
sub_head: The office-space startup agreed to push back until March 12 a bid deadline for its assets to resolve creditor challenges over the tight sales timeline
body:
Knotel Inc. has struck a deal with unsecured creditors that will give potential bidders more time to submit offers to acquire the office-space startupâ€™s assets out of bankruptcy.
Knotel agreed to push back to March 12 the deadline for submitting asset bids, lawyers for the company and a committee representing unsecured creditors said Thursday during a hearing in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del. The committee includes food-delivery startup DoorDash Inc., technology company Neustar Inc. and landlords.
